notes:
[Noyan Dar] is absurd. You have to draft around him a little bit, but he gives all of your spells "Awaken 3" for free. While there's definitely a risk in taking a gold card as a first pick, Noyan Dar is probably worth the risk.

Unfortunately the rest of the pack is pretty mediocre: [Smite the Monstrous] is probably the runner up as a solid if conditional removal spell.
